context: Consolidating documentation and understanding Seed architecture after discovering documentation drift
key_insights: Documentation drift happened rapidly after launch - vision mixed with reality
Seeds are not templates - they're documentation structures that enable Weather System
We're eating our own dog food with Farm/Garden/Seed architecture
Farms don't have .git directories - that's why we built the event system
Our documentation IS our Seed - practicing what we preach
The minimum Seed is just docs/README.md explaining your workflow

critical_moments.human_input: Weather & Docs may be out of sync... there may be duplicated information, contradicting information
critical_moments.ai_response: Created reality check showing what actually exists vs. what's planned
critical_moments.outcome: Clear separation of current state from visions

critical_moments.human_input: The insight that is in one or multiple of our docs that talks about Seeds is vital, because essentially our Doc system is a Seed
critical_moments.ai_response: Revised entire approach to focus on Seeds as the foundation
critical_moments.outcome: Created comprehensive Seed documentation and examples

critical_moments.human_input: Farms do not have .git directories... We are living in this environment so we are sort of eating our own dogfood
critical_moments.ai_response: Updated documentation to reflect actual Farm/Garden/Seed usage

decisions_made: Create /current/ directory as single source of truth
Build three example Seeds (minimal, team, enterprise)
Fix our own Seed before helping others
preservation_reason: Critical strategic realignment separating reality from vision and establishing Seeds as core concept
